DOC.brief_summary: Concomitant chemoradiotherapy standard treatment locally advance , non-resectable , non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . However , optimal chemotherapy regimen still controversial . The purpose study evaluate efficacy toxicity concomitant treatment use Endostar ( Recombinant Human Endostatin ) , Paclitaxel/Carboplatin radiotherapy LA-NSCLC , also assess impact patient Quality Life ( QoL ) progression-free survival ( PFS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Concurrent Endostar , Paclitaxel/Carboplatin Radiotherapy Locally Advanced Non-small Cell Lung ( RT0902 )
DOC.detailed_description: Patients non-resectable non-small Cell Lung Cancer receive thoracic radiation therapy 60-66 Gy 30-33 fraction concurrent Endostar 7.5 mg/m2 3 hour d1-14 , Paclitaxel 50 mg/m2 weekly 1 hour , Carboplatin AUC = 2 mg/mL/min 30 min weekly . Followed Endostar 7.5 mg/m2 d1-14 , Paclitaxel 175 mg/m2 d1 Carboplatin AUC = 5 mg/mL/min d1 every 3 week 2 cycle consolidation treatment .
